forum_controls.you_must_be_logged_in_to_post: You must be logged in to post.
forum_controls.no_posts_description: You can write first post here.
forum_controls.no_comments_description: You can write your first reply here
forum_controls.submitted_desc: It may take a few moments to appear on forum.
forum_controls.post_404_desc: But there are many another interesting posts.
forum_controls.reply_hidden_AUTHOR: Reply by @%(AUTHOR)s hidden (low ratings) - click to show
forum_controls.hide_confirm: Are you sure you want to hide this post?
forum_controls.reveal_confirm: Are you sure you want to reveal this post?
forum_controls.only_creator_can_edit: You do not have access to edit this forum.

post_form.title: Enter title
post_form.error_submitting_description: Please contact us and provide the text below in your message.

voting.vote_changes_exceed: You exceed your voting limit for this post.
voting.you_must_be_logged_in_to_vote: You must be logged in to vote

donating.you_must_be_logged_in_to_donate: You must be logged in to donate

categories.title: Forum Categories
categories.description: These settings control the structure of this forum and can be changed at any time. If your want to restore deleted category, just create new one with same tags.
categories.name: Name in English

permissions.title: Forum Permissions
permissions.description: The permissions of different Golos Blockchain users within this forum.
permissions.super_moderators_desc: Have all moderator permissions and can mute the users.
permissions.admins_desc: Have all super-moderator permissions and can block the users.

account.cannot_load_image_try_again: Cannot upload image. Try again or another one.

login.key_warn_description: As with all Steem powered applications, please be aware of what website you're on and if you trust the organization running it. Make sure you are only using your posting key and your active/owner keys remain safe (preferrably in a wallet or offline). Use active key only if cases when you want transfer some tokens, etc.
login.active_description: This operation requires your Active key or password.
login.memo_description: This operation requires your Memo key or password.
login.wrong_password_not_active: This operation requires active-key, not posting or owner
login.wrong_password_not_memo: This operation requires memo-key, not posting or active
login.wrong_password_active: Cannot login with active key (even if posting key is same)
login.wrong_password_owner: Cannot login with owner key (even if posting key is same)
login.warning_password: Check that you safely saved your password.
login.checkbox_password: I understand that GOLOS cannot restore my password.
login.pdf_desc: There are private keys, which are authorizing your account. Store this file in secure place.
login.pdf_password_desc: Password (use it to log in on forum):
login.pdf_posting_desc: Posting Key (also can be used as forum password):

validation.account_name_should_be_shorter: Account name should not be longer that 16 characters.
validation.account_name_should_be_longer: Account name should not be shorter than 3 characters.
validation.account_name_should_not_be_empty: Account name should not be empty.
validation.each_account_segment_should_start_with_a: Account name should start with a letter.
validation.each_account_segment_should_have_only_le: Account name should have only letters, digits, or dashes.
validation.each_account_segment_should_have_only_on: Account name should have only one dash in a row.
validation.each_account_segment_should_end_with_a_l: Account name should end with a letter or digit.
validation.each_account_segment_should_be_longer: Account name should not be shorter than 3 characters.
validation.only_letters_digits_dashes: Only latinic letters, digits and dashes.
validation.should_not_be_longer_THAN: Should not be longer than %(THAN)s char.

leave_page.title: You are leaving
leave_page.desc1: The link, which you have clicked, redirects you to:
leave_page.desc2: are not affiliating with this website, so we cannot guarantee safety of it. Proprietary Web-sites can run malicious code or use scamming techniques.
leave_page.desc3: We did not recommend you to go to this link if you are not believe this Web-site is secure.
leave_page.desc4: Remember what keys of your account in
leave_page.desc5: cannot be recovered, and claiming access of them will allow scammers use your funds.

emoji_i18n.skinToneDescription: When expanded, press up or down to select and enter to choose.

g.author: Author
